general_advisory: In view of heat wave condition provide adequate amount of irrigation. Apply mulches to maintain high moisture status in the soil. Cover the freshly prepared vegetable nursery with polythene or with straw to avoid high temperature. The increasing day temperature may cause bacterial wilt disease. Spray 1gm Streptocycline in 10 litre water in the root zone of the plants.

advisory: Time for sowing of maize for green cob purpose under irrigated condition. Use 6 kg seeds/acre. Apply 55- kg of DAP and 22- kg of potash as basal. To maintain optimum plant population, use seed drill for sowing or sow the seeds behind the plough.

Optimum time for yam planting. Grow suitable high yielding varieties of yam. Cut the yam into pieces of 150-200 g each. Dig out holes at 3X3 ft spacing. Apply 5 tons FYM during final land preparation.

Carp such as Rohu, Catla and Mrigal should be stocked in a certain ratio of 4:3:3 to increase benefits. Maintain a standard stocking density of 5,000 fingerlings/ha. Apply groundnut oil cake and rice bran in same ratio for the stocking material.
Provide clean and sufficient water to the cattle. Allow grazing in morning or afternoon. Do bathing twice a day. Use fans for well ventilation. Feed less in the morning and more in the evening.
Provide shade on the poultry house. Sprinkle water to control high temperature. Provide clean and adequate water to the poultry.
